item.title: More Movies Should Embrace The Amateur's Clever Approach To Action Spy Movies, Especially After This Weapon Detail

item.title: Which Version Of Galadriel Is The Most Powerful: LOTR Vs. The Hobbit Vs. The Rings Of Power
item.description: We've now seen Galadriel at three different points in Middle-earth's timeline, and though she's always powerful, he strength isn't entirely equal.

item.title: Robert Redford's 10 Best Movies, Ranked
item.description: From The Way We Were to All the President's Men, picking the best Robert Redford movies out of so many great films is not an easy task.
